name: Shadow Recall
description: A solo platformer game where you play as a lone soul, completely abandoned and forgotten. You try to escape the place you've been put in, only to find yourself in a harsher enviorment. You have to find secret collectables, and venture forwards and try to escape the mad realm you're in. As you progress more, the harder the levels become, some might feel imposible, but with determination anyone can beat this realm.
